jobs.name: Daily trends scan (TikTok/YouTube/X)
jobs.description: Scan trends and extract product content angles for TikTok, YouTube, X.

payload.message:
Load skill: skills/x/SKILL.md

Run the Scan-Routine from the X skill. Scan today's trends on TikTok, YouTube, and X relevant to our product niche (BMA, AI Automation, OpenClaw). Output: 10 trend bullets, 10 hooks, 5 product angles, 3 content series ideas, 3 reply opportunities. Save results to x_lead_machine/trending_now.md. Keep it concise and actionable.

jobs.name: Daily short-form scripts
jobs.description: Draft short-form scripts for TikTok/YouTube/X from trend inputs.

payload.message:
Load skills: skills/x/SKILL.md + skills/writing/SKILL.md

Based on yesterday's trend scan (x_lead_machine/trending_now.md), create:
- 3 TikTok/Reel scripts (<=45s) using the Larry skill format
- 9 X/Twitter posts using Maurice's posting rules (3 Insights, 2 Threads, 2 Replies, 1 Langform, 1 Zitat)
- Apply writing voice rules (verbotene Wörter, Satz-Struktur)
Format as a ready-to-post checklist. Save to x_lead_machine/READY_TO_POST.md

jobs.name: Daily offer packaging
jobs.description: Refine product offer, CTA, and landing copy snippets.

payload.message:
Load skills: skills/revenue/SKILL.md + skills/writing/SKILL.md

Refine today's product offer from the revenue channel priority list. Output: 1 primary CTA, 2 alternate CTAs, 3 headline variants, 3 subhead variants, 5 value bullets. Apply Maurice's voice (direkt, konkret, keine verbotenen Wörter). Focus on BMA Checklisten Bundle (149 EUR) as primary offer today.

jobs.name: Weekly revenue pipeline review
jobs.description: Weekly revenue checklist and next actions.

payload.message:
Load skill: skills/revenue/SKILL.md

Weekly revenue review using the Revenue Dashboard format. Summarize: content output, engagement, funnel status, sales blockers, CRM pipeline state, and top 5 actions for next week. Use BANT-scoring from the leads skill to prioritize. Output as concise bullets. Save to docs/reviews/weekly-$(date +%Y-%m-%d).md

jobs.name: Daily content calendar (TikTok/YouTube/X)
jobs.description: Plan daily posting slots, topics, and CTAs for TikTok, YouTube, and X.

payload.message:
Load skill: skills/larry/SKILL.md

Build today's content calendar using the Larry skill. Create posting schedule: 4 X/Twitter slots (07:30, 12:00, 17:30, 21:00), 2 TikTok slots (08:00, 18:00), 2 LinkedIn slots (09:00, 14:00). For each: topic, hook, CTA, target audience, platform format. If Postiz API key is configured, schedule via API. Output calendar as structured list.

jobs.name: Daily YouTube long-form outline
jobs.description: Create a long-form YouTube outline based on top trend/offer.

payload.message:
Load skills: skills/writing/SKILL.md + skills/bma/SKILL.md

Draft a 6-10 minute YouTube video outline based on today's top trend (from trending_now.md) or top BMA product angle. Apply Maurice's voice and writing rules. Include: 3 title options, hook (first 15 seconds), 5-7 content beats, CTA (Gumroad link), thumbnail text ideas. Choose topic from BMA or AI Automation niche.

jobs.name: Daily engagement playbook
jobs.description: Generate engagement replies and community prompts for TikTok/YouTube/X.

payload.message:
Load skills: skills/x/SKILL.md + skills/leads/SKILL.md + skills/writing/SKILL.md

Create today's engagement playbook: 10 reply templates (in Maurice's voice, keine verbotenen Wörter), 5 community prompts for Agent Builders Club, 5 DM openers for hot leads (BANT Score 9+). Identify any reply opportunities from today's trending topics. Flag any inbound messages that look like Hot Leads (Score 9-12) for immediate action.

jobs.name: Weekly batch production plan
jobs.description: Plan weekly batch filming/writing for TikTok/YouTube/X.

payload.message:
Load skills: skills/larry/SKILL.md + skills/bma/SKILL.md + skills/writing/SKILL.md

Weekly batch production plan: 10 short-form video ideas (TikTok/Reel, 45s format), 3 long-form YouTube ideas, 5 BMA-specific content pieces for consulting leads, filming order and a 2-hour production schedule. Apply virality triggers from Larry skill. Prioritize content that can convert to Gumroad sales or consulting leads.

jobs.name: Daily KPI snapshot
jobs.description: Create a daily KPI checklist to track views, CTR, and conversions.

payload.message:
Load skill: skills/revenue/SKILL.md

Daily KPI snapshot using the Revenue Dashboard format. Log today's: Gumroad sales (EUR), Fiverr orders, consulting inquiries, community signups, X follower growth, TikTok views, LinkedIn reach, CRM pipeline changes, new hot leads. Compare against monthly targets. Output 5-bullet optimization plan for tomorrow. Save snapshot to docs/reviews/kpi-$(date +%Y-%m-%d).md
